patthana17.9:4.1: Kusalaṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.9:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana17.9:5.1: Kusalaṃ apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naapacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.9:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.9:6.1: Abyākataṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
